description: Welcome to my portfolio site, hope you enjoy! I've been inspired by the great dystopian novelists, beats and counter-cultural figures to think playfully yet seriously about systemic problems. I am not impacted as severely by these problems by virtue of my arbitrary privilege as a white male. I milk this privilege for all it's worth, speaking truth to power.
…The trick is to find the right balance between research, reflection and repetition…
…if philosophers are the pigeons loitering on the statues of scientific discoveries, then artists are the parrots…
